title: FS: Group of 4 Low Grade T206 - Ames, Konetchy, Murphy, Phelps

posts.post_title: FS: Group of 4 Low Grade T206 - Ames, Konetchy, Murphy, Phelps
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. As the scans will show, these are lower grade cards with significant condition issues.

Please add $3 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

Ames - $18 **SOLD**
Konetchy - $18
Murphy (Polar Bear) - $20
Phelps (Polar Bear) - $20

Marc --

You got my blood pressure up with the Ames, as I slowly scrolled down...hoping, hoping, hoping...nope, not a Sovereign 150.  Ughhh.  One day.  Good luck with the sale!

Cheers,
Geno
